meta.title: Progress
meta.description: A custom progress component for displaying simple or complex progress bars, featuring support for horizontally stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

props.description: Enable the animated background. Also automatically sets 'striped'
Override the default height by specifying a CSS height value (including units)
The number of digits after the decimal to round the value to
Displays the current progress value as a percentage
The current value of the progress bar
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content (progress bars) to place in the progress element

props.description: Enable the animated background. Also automatically sets 'striped'
Text string to explicitly set the label as
HTML string to explicitly set the label as
The number of digits after the decimal to round the value to
Displays the current progress value as a percentage
The current value of the progress bar
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the progress bar. Overrides the `label`, `label-html`, `show-progress` and `show-value` props
